text: Marvel Zombies is an upcoming American animated TV miniseries that will be part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Set in a different reality that appeared in the series What If...?, the series will release on Disney+. It will be produced by Marvel Studios Animation. It will have four episodes. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Upcoming television series Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:American television spin-offs Category:Disney+ original television series Category:English-language television programs Category:2020s American television series Category:Superhero television shows
title: Marvel Zombies (miniseries)
